notesStmt.note: Imperfect at the beginning and at the end. Lacunae after folios 93, 102, 150. Slightly damaged.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Parts of David ben Abraham Maimuni's homiletico-agadic commentary on Exodus.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Black buckram, blind tooled. Spine title: 'David ben Abraham. Comm. on Exodus. Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 68.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: A. C. Reichardt: purchased by the British Library from him on 08 June 1867: inscribed, folio [224v].
